Out of the eight (08) activities, the entity fully implemented two (02) activities (25%) while six (06) activities (75%) remained partially implemented. I noted that the Hospital submitted three (3) out of four (4) quarterly performance reports to Treasury within the prescribed deadlines. However, there was no documentary proof of preparation and submission of annual monitoring plans and reports to MoFPED and NPA as required. I further noted inconsistences in the financial information reported in the performance reports when compared with the financial statements.
